title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, pecorino, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crisp; set aside.
Whisk eggs, yolk, cheese, and pepper in a bowl.
Drain pasta (reserve some water).
Toss hot pasta with pancetta and egg mixture off heat.
Loosen with pasta water; season and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken in a creamy spiced tomato sauce.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices 30–60 minutes.
Grill or pan-sear chicken until charred; set aside.
Sauté onion, ginger, garlic until soft.
Add tomatoes; simmer 10 minutes.
Stir in cream; add chicken; simmer 5 minutes.
Adjust seasoning; serve with rice/naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Sourdough with smashed avocado, chili flakes, and lemon.
steps: Mash avocado with lemon, salt, pepper.
Spread on toast; drizzle oil.
Finish with chili flakes; serve immediately.

title: Beef Ramen Bowl
summary: Soy-marinated beef with ramen, soft egg, and scallions.
steps: Marinate beef in soy + mirin 10 minutes; sear quickly.
Boil eggs 6–7 minutes; peel.
Cook ramen in broth.
Assemble bowl with noodles, broth, beef, halved eggs.
Top with scallions, sesame oil.
